column154:
+*Current functional status:*+

# Following fields are not exposed in the Entry Code accounting CBC service,
## ReinsurEntryCodeSignShortName
## ReinsurEntryCodeSignName 
## ReinsurEntryCodeRsrvShortName
## ReinsurEntryCodeReserveName
## ReinsurEntryCodeTypeShortName
## ReinsurEntryCodeTypeName
## ReinsurEntryCodeCarryFwdName
## ReinsurFundRtntnOrRelShortName
## ReinsurFundRtntnOrRelName
## ReinsurCurAcctPostingShortName
## ReinsurCurAccountPostingName
## ReinsurEntrCodeFundTypShrtName
## ReinsurEntryCodeFundTypeName
## ReinsurEntryCodeAccrDefrlName
## ReinsurEntrCdOpngRsrvShortName
## ReinsurEntrCodeOpngReserveName
## ReinsurEntrCdClsgRsrvShortName
## ReinsurEntrCodeClsgReserveName
## einsurCededEntryCodeShortName
## ReinsurCededEntryCodeName
## ReinsurPrtfloEntrCodeShortName
## ReinsurPrtfloEntryCodeName

+*Target functional status:*+

Above mentioned missing fields needs to be exposed.

+*Technical description of the change:*+

# Created Basic views to expose the fields from the table
# Created Interface views to expose the fields from the Basic views
# Created Consumption views to expose the fields from the Interface views
# Newly created Consumption views have been used in Entry Code CBC service to expose the requested fields.

column1: CORE - Odata Treaty Group: Posting allowed period status without assigned treaty
column7: SAP Reinsurance Management for SAP S/4HANA
column28:
It must not be possible to use a posting allowed status on a treaty group period if for the treaty group period no treaty is assigned. Status 10 on RD9 700 has flag posting allowed.

Example request


{noformat}--batch
content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=changeset

--changeset
content-type: application/http
content-id: "Entry1"

POST /sap/opu/odata4/sap/ztest_api_tg_grphdr_manage_o4/srvd_a2x/sap/ztest_tg_grphdr_manage/0001/GroupHeader HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Accept-Language:de-DE

{
  "ReinsurGroupText": "TME Test Service",
  "ReinsurGroupType": "1",
  "ReinsurGroupCompanyCode": "ISR1",
  "_Grp": [ {
          "ReinsurGroupStartDate" : "2023-01-01",
          "ReinsurGroupStatus" : "10",
          "ReinsurGroupChngRsn" : "2"
    },
    {
          "ReinsurGroupStartDate" : "2022-01-01",
          "ReinsurGroupStatus" : "2",
          "ReinsurGroupChngRsn" : "2"
    } ]

}

--changeset--

--batch--{noformat}

column193: CORE - OData Services for Treaty Group - Account Groups

column1: CORE - Odata Treaty Group: Create does not populate field /MSG/RGRP_HD-GRP_TXT_CPT
column7: SAP Reinsurance Management for SAP S/4HANA
column28:
A treaty group created with the odata service is not found during search on the SAP GUI when a description is used for search.
Reason seems to be that the field /MSG/RGRP_HD-GRP_TXT_CPT is not populated it should receive GRP_TXT in uppercase.

Compare on RD9 700 group 2085. T-code /MSG/R_VG2: If I search e.g. with group number 208* the group is returned. If I only search with TME Test* in the field description the group 2085 is not part of the search result

column193: CORE - OData Services for Treaty Group - Account Groups

column1: CORE - Odata Treaty Group: Only account groups must be created
column7: SAP Reinsurance Management for SAP S/4HANA
column28:
The Odata service to create treaty groups should only support creation of treaty groups with category account groups. An account group category is identified by the flag account set in the group category configuration. Currently only group category 1 is supported which is not an account group.
Request works although not a category account group provided


{noformat}--batch
content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=changeset

--changeset
content-type: application/http
content-id: "Entry1"

POST /sap/opu/odata4/sap/ztest_api_tg_grphdr_manage_o4/srvd_a2x/sap/ztest_tg_grphdr_manage/0001/GroupHeader HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Accept-Language:de-DE

{

  "ReinsurGroupText": "TME Test Service",
  "ReinsurGroupType": "1",
  "ReinsurTreatyInternalID": "1059441",
  "ReinsurGroupCompanyCode": "ISR1"

}

--changeset--

--batch-- {noformat}

Request fails although a account group was provided 


{noformat}--batch
content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=changeset

--changeset
content-type: application/http
content-id: "Entry1"

POST /sap/opu/odata4/sap/ztest_api_tg_grphdr_manage_o4/srvd_a2x/sap/ztest_tg_grphdr_manage/0001/GroupHeader HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept:application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;IEEE754Compatible=true
Accept-Language:de-DE

{

  "ReinsurGroupText": "TME Test Service",
  "ReinsurGroupType": "ACC",
  "ReinsurTreatyInternalID": "1059441",
  "ReinsurGroupCompanyCode": "ISR1"

}

--changeset--

--batch--{noformat}
